meanings.definition: Showing disapproval or contempt towards others, especially those considered inferior.
meanings.sent1: The snootiest girl in class always looks down on others.
meanings.sent2: She acted snootiest when she saw the old, worn-out shoes.
meanings.sent3: The snootiest cat in the neighborhood refuses to play with the other cats.
meanings.sent4: Her snootiest attitude was like a dark cloud over the party.
meanings.sent5: The snootiest expression on her face made everyone uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a haughty or arrogant manner.
meanings.sent1: He felt snootiest when he ignored his friends' suggestions.
meanings.sent2: The snootiest guest at the party refused to talk to anyone.
meanings.sent3: The snootiest squirrel in the park stole all the nuts for itself.
meanings.sent4: Her snootiest behavior made her unpopular among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The snootiest tone in his voice made it clear he thought he was better than everyone else.

meanings.definition: Having an attitude of superiority or condescension.
meanings.sent1: The snootiest student in the class always corrected others.
meanings.sent2: She gave the snootiest smile when she won the competition.
meanings.sent3: The snootiest bird in the tree refused to share its perch.
meanings.sent4: His snootiest remarks made everyone feel small.
meanings.sent5: The snootiest look in his eyes made it clear he thought he was above everyone else.
